20320194Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int[,] LoadFromFile(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var pairs = new Dictionary<int, List<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var reader = new StreamReader(filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (!reader.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            var elems = line.Split(new[] { "->" }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine            if (elems.Length <= 1)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var froms = elems[0].Split(',').Select(x => int.Parse(x)).ToList();Di2015NewLine            var tos = elems[1].Split(',').Select(x => int.Parse(x)).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var from in froms)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!pairs.ContainsKey(from))Di2015NewLine                    pairs.Add(from, new List<int>());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var to in tos)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!pairs.ContainsKey(to))Di2015NewLine                        pairs.Add(to, new List<int>());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    pairs[from].Add(to);Di2015NewLine                    pairs[to].Add(from);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var size = pairs.Keys.Max() + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var edges = new int[size, size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var p in pairs.SelectMany(x => x.Value.Select(y => new { x = x.Key, y})))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        edges[p.x, p.y] = 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return edges;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20323067Di2015UniqueSeparator    private List<string> RecPermute(string soFar, string rest, List<string> tmp = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (tmp == null) tmp = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        if (rest == "")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //soFar.Dump();Di2015NewLine            tmp.Add(soFar);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < rest.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string next = soFar + rest[i];Di2015NewLine                string remaining = rest.Substring(0, i) + rest.Substring(i + 1);Di2015NewLine                RecPermute(next, remaining, tmp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20324013Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool Flush(SuperCard[] hand)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Object.ReferenceEquals(null, hand))Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < hand.Length - 1; i++) // <- Pay attention to "Length - 1"Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!hand[i].Equals(hand[i + 1]))     // <- "== false" is quite awkwardDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // You don't need any additional checks here:Di2015NewLine    // A[0] = A[1] = ... = A[length - 1]Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20328640Di2015UniqueSeparatorConcurrentExclusiveSchedulerPair
20328640Di2015UniqueSeparatorCondition In variable pattern
20328640Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal sealed class ConditionVariablePattern {Di2015NewLine  private readonly Object m_lock = new Object();Di2015NewLine  private Boolean m_condition = false;Di2015NewLine  public void Thread1() {Di2015NewLine    Monitor.Enter(m_lock); // Acquire a mutual-exclusive lockDi2015NewLine    // While under the lock, test the complex condition "atomically"Di2015NewLine    while (!m_condition) {Di2015NewLine    // If condition is not met, wait for another thread to change the conditionDi2015NewLine       Monitor.Wait(m_lock); // Temporarily release lock so other threads can get itDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // The condition was met, process the data...Di2015NewLine    Monitor.Exit(m_lock); // Permanently release lockDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine public void Thread2() {Di2015NewLine    Monitor.Enter(m_lock); // Acquire a mutual-exclusive lockDi2015NewLine   // Process data and modify the condition...Di2015NewLine   m_condition = true;Di2015NewLine   // Monitor.Pulse(m_lock); // Wakes one waiter AFTER lock is releasedDi2015NewLine   Monitor.PulseAll(m_lock); // Wakes all waiters AFTER lock is releasedDi2015NewLine   Monitor.Exit(m_lock); // Release lockDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20330462Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction Name: ToBinDi2015NewLineFunction (NumberVar n)Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    Local StringVar b;Di2015NewLine    Local NumberVar d;Di2015NewLine    b := "";Di2015NewLine    d := n;Di2015NewLine    DoDi2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        b := CStr(Truncate(d Mod 2),0) & b;Di2015NewLine        d := Truncate(d / 2);Di2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLine    While (d > 1);Di2015NewLine    CStr(Truncate(d),0) & b;Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunction Name: ToNumDi2015NewLineFunction (StringVar b)Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    Local NumberVar lng := length(b);Di2015NewLine    Local NumberVar n := 0;Di2015NewLine    Local NumberVar i;Di2015NewLine    For i := lng To 1 Step -1 DoDi2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        n := n + ((2 ^ (lng  i)) * Truncate(ToNumber(Mid(b,i,1))))Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine    n;Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunction Name: BitAndDi2015NewLineFunction (NumberVar n1, NumberVar n2)Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    Local StringVar b1 := ToBin(n1);Di2015NewLine    Local StringVar b2 := ToBin(n2);Di2015NewLine    Local NumberVar l1 := length(b1);Di2015NewLine    Local NumberVar l2 := length(b2);Di2015NewLine    Local NumberVar lng := IIF(l1 > l2, l1, l2);Di2015NewLine    Local StringVar x;Di2015NewLine    Local StringVar y;Di2015NewLine    Local StringVar z := "";Di2015NewLine    Local NumberVar i;Di2015NewLine    For i := lng To 1 Step -1 DoDi2015NewLine    (Di2015NewLine        x := "0";Di2015NewLine        If (l1 >= i) ThenDi2015NewLine            x := Mid(b1, (l1-i)+1, 1);Di2015NewLine        y := "0";Di2015NewLine        If (l2 >= i) ThenDi2015NewLine            y := Mid(b2, (l2-i)+1, 1);Di2015NewLine        z := z & IIF(x=y And x="1","1","0");Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine    ToNum(z);Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunction Name: BitXOrDi2015NewLineFunction (NumberVar n1, NumberVar n2)Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    n1 + n2  (BitAnd(n1, n2) * 2)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunction Name: BitOrDi2015NewLineFunction (NumberVar n1, NumberVar n2)Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    n1 + n2  BitAnd(n1, n2)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineExampleDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBitAnd(1, 5)  // = 1Di2015NewLineBitXOr(1, 5)  // = 4Di2015NewLineBitOr(1, 5)  // = 5Di2015NewLine

20337602Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T SingleOrNewIdentified<T, TProp>(this IQueryable<T> queryable, Expression<Func<T, TProp>> propExpr, TProp value) where T : class, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var property = (PropertyInfo)((MemberExpression)propExpr.Body).Member;Di2015NewLine    var paramExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    var eqExpr = Expression.Equal(Expression.Property(paramExpr, property), Expression.Constant(value));Di2015NewLine    var predicate = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(eqExpr, paramExpr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T maybe = queryable.SingleOrDefault(predicate);Di2015NewLine    if (maybe != null) return maybe;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T @default = new T();Di2015NewLine    property.SetValue(@default, value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return @default;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20339356Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static BitmapSource CopyScreen()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var left = Screen.AllScreens.Min(screen => screen.Bounds.X);Di2015NewLine        var top = Screen.AllScreens.Min(screen => screen.Bounds.Y);Di2015NewLine        var right = Screen.AllScreens.Max(screen => screen.Bounds.X + screen.Bounds.Width);Di2015NewLine        var bottom = Screen.AllScreens.Max(screen => screen.Bounds.Y + screen.Bounds.Height);Di2015NewLine        var width = right - left;Di2015NewLine        var height = bottom - top;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var screenBmp = new Bitmap(width, height, System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var bmpGraphics = Graphics.FromImage(screenBmp))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bmpGraphics.CopyFromScreen(left, top, 0, 0, new System.Drawing.Size(width, height));Di2015NewLine                return Imaging.CreateBitmapSourceFromHBitmap(Di2015NewLine                    screenBmp.GetHbitmap(),Di2015NewLine                    IntPtr.Zero,Di2015NewLine                    Int32Rect.Empty,Di2015NewLine                    BitmapSizeOptions.FromEmptyOptions());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20342938Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PropertyHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string GetDisplayName<T>(Expression<Func<T, object>> propertyExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression expression;Di2015NewLine        if (propertyExpression.Body.NodeType == ExpressionType.Convert)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            expression = ((UnaryExpression)propertyExpression.Body).Operand;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            expression = propertyExpression.Body;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (expression.NodeType != ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Must be a property expression.", "propertyExpression");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var me = (MemberExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine        var member = me.Member;Di2015NewLine        var att = member.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DisplayAttribute), false).OfType<DisplayAttribute>().FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        if (att != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return att.Name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // No attribute found, just use the actual name.Di2015NewLine            return member.Name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetDisplayName<T>(this T target, Expression<Func<T, object>> propertyExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetDisplayName<T>(propertyExpression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20349208Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate TreeNode FindNode(String name, TreeNode root)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(root.Name == name) return root;Di2015NewLine    Stack<TreeNode> nodes = new Stack<TreeNode>();Di2015NewLine    nodes.Push(root);Di2015NewLine    while(nodes.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var node = nodes.Pop();Di2015NewLine        foreach(TreeNode n in node.Nodes){Di2015NewLine           if (n.Name == name) return n;Di2015NewLine           nodes.Push(n);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//UsageDi2015NewLinevar node = FindNode(someName, treeView1.Nodes[0]);Di2015NewLine//if your treeView has more root nodes, you have to loop through themDi2015NewLineTreeNode node = null;Di2015NewLineforeach(TreeNode node in treeView1.Nodes){Di2015NewLine  node = FindNode(someName, node);Di2015NewLine  if(node != null) break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20350453Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void CopyToIsolatedStorage(string file, IsolatedStorageFile store, bool overwrite = true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine            if (store.FileExists(file) && !overwrite)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var resourceStream = Application.GetResourceStream(new Uri(file, UriKind.Relative)).Stream)Di2015NewLine            using (var fileStream = store.OpenFile(file, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.ReadWrite, FileShare.ReadWrite))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int bytesRead;Di2015NewLine                var buffer = new byte[resourceStream.Length];Di2015NewLine                while ((bytesRead = resourceStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                    fileStream.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20350646Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool IsAsyncMethod(Type classType, string methodName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Obtain the method with the specified name.Di2015NewLine    MethodInfo method = classType.GetMethod(methodName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type attType = typeof(AsyncStateMachineAttribute);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Obtain the custom attribute for the method. Di2015NewLine    // The value returned contains the StateMachineType property. Di2015NewLine    // Null is returned if the attribute isn't present for the method. Di2015NewLine    var attrib = (AsyncStateMachineAttribute)method.GetCustomAttribute(attType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (attrib != null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20351921Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass VirtualServerInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string ESXi { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Count { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static List<VirtualServerInfo> lstVMStats()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ITAPP.Models.DBEntities db = new ITAPP.Models.DBEntities();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var varESxis = from d in db.tblVirtualServers Di2015NewLine                   group d by d.ESXiID into g Di2015NewLine                   orderby g.Count() descending, g.Key Di2015NewLine                   select new VirtualServerInfo{Di2015NewLine                    ESXi = g.Key,Di2015NewLine                    Count = g.Count() Di2015NewLine                   };Di2015NewLine    return varESxis.ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20352028Di2015UniqueSeparatorTextChanged
20352028Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void TextBox_TextChanged(object sender, TextChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //get the textbox that fired the eventDi2015NewLine    var textBox = sender as TextBox;Di2015NewLine    if (textBox == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var text = textBox.Text;Di2015NewLine    var output = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    //use this boolean to determine if the dot already existsDi2015NewLine    //in the text so far.Di2015NewLine    var dotEncountered = false;Di2015NewLine    //loop through all of the textDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < text.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var c = text[i];Di2015NewLine        if (char.IsDigit(c))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //append any digit.Di2015NewLine            output.Append(c);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (!dotEncountered && c == '.') Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //append the first dot encounteredDi2015NewLine            output.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            dotEncountered = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var newText = output.ToString();Di2015NewLine    textBox.Text = newText;Di2015NewLine    //set the caret to the end of textDi2015NewLine    textBox.CaretIndex = newText.Length;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

void DoOnce(CloudBlockBlob blob, Action action, TimeSpan pollingFrequency)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // blob.Exists has the side effect of calling blob.FetchAttributes, which populates the metadata collectionDi2015NewLine            while (!blob.Exists() || blob.Metadata["progress"] != "done")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (var arl = new AutoRenewLease(blob))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (arl.HasLease)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        action();Di2015NewLine                        blob.Metadata["progress"] = "done";Di2015NewLine                        AccessCondition ac = new AccessCondition();Di2015NewLine                        ac.LeaseId = arl.leaseId;Di2015NewLine                        blob.SetMetadata(ac);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Thread.Sleep(pollingFrequency);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine            string containerName = "leasesContainer", TimeSpan? pollingFrequency = null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //http://www.windowsazure.com/en-us/develop/net/how-to-guides/blob-storage/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //    Di2015NewLine            //http://<storage DoEvery(CloudBlockBlob blob, TimeSpan interval, Action action)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var lastPerformed = DateTimeOffset.MinValue;Di2015NewLine                using (var arl = new AutoRenewLease(blob))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (arl.HasLease)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        blob.FetchAttributes();Di2015NewLine                        DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact(blob.Metadata["lastPerformed"], "R", CultureInfo.CurrentCulture, DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal, out lastPerformed);Di2015NewLine                        if (DateTimeOffset.UtcNow >= lastPerformed + interval)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            action();Di2015NewLine                            lastPerformed = DateTimeOffset.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine                            blob.Metadata["lastPerformed"] = lastPerformed.ToString("R");Di2015NewLine                            AccessCondition ac = new AccessCondition();Di2015NewLine                            ac.LeaseId = arl.leaseId;Di2015NewLine                            blob.SetMetadata(ac);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                var timeLeft = (lastPerformed + interval) - DateTimeOffset.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine                var minimum = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5); // so we're not polling the leased blob too fastDi2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(Di2015NewLine                    timeLeft > minimumDi2015NewLine                    ? timeLeftDi2015NewLine                    : minimum);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public AutoRenewLease(CloudBlockBlob blob)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.blob = blob;Di2015NewLine            blob.Container.CreateIfNotExists();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!blob.Exists())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    blob.UploadFromByteArray(new byte[0], 0, 0, AccessCondition.GenerateIfNoneMatchCondition("*"));// new BlobRequestOptions { AccessCondition = AccessCondition.IfNoneMatch("*") });Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (StorageException e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (e.RequestInformation.HttpStatusCode != (int)HttpStatusCode.PreconditionFailed // 412 from trying to modify a blob that's leasedDi2015NewLine                    && e.RequestInformation.ExtendedErrorInformation.ErrorCode != BlobErrorCodeStrings.BlobAlreadyExistsDi2015NewLine                    )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                leaseId = blob.AcquireLease(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(60), null);Di2015NewLine                _accessCondition = new AccessCondition { LeaseId = leaseId };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Trace.WriteLine("==========> Lease rejected! <==========");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (HasLease)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                renewalThread = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    while (true)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Thread.Sleep(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(40));Di2015NewLine                        var ac = new AccessCondition();Di2015NewLine                        ac.LeaseId = leaseId;Di2015NewLine                        blob.RenewLease(ac);//.RenewLease(leaseId);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine                renewalThread.Start();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine            GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                disposed = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ~AutoRenewLease()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 20354878Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task<byte[]> PostDataAsync(string url, NameValueCollection parameters, object state)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<byte[]>(state: state);Di2015NewLine    var client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine    client.UploadValuesCompleted += (obj, args) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (args.Cancelled)Di2015NewLine            tcs.SetCanceled();Di2015NewLine        else if (args.Error != null)Di2015NewLine            tcs.SetException(args.Error);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            tcs.SetResult(args.Result);Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    client.Headers[HttpRequestHeader.ContentType] = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine    client.UploadValuesAsync(new Uri(url), null, parameters, state);Di2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20354885Di2015UniqueSeparatorCOLOR0
20354885Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat4 main(float4 color : COLOR0, float2 texCoord : TEXCOORD0) : COLOR0Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return tex2D(TextureSampler, texCoord) * color;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20354885Di2015UniqueSeparatorcolor
20354885Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat4 main(float4 color : COLOR0, float2 texCoord : TEXCOORD0) : COLOR0Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Look up the texture color.Di2015NewLine    float4 tex = tex2D(TextureSampler, texCoord);Di2015NewLine    tex.rgb *= color.rgb;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Convert it to greyscale. The constants 0.3, 0.59, and 0.11 are becauseDi2015NewLine    // the human eye is more sensitive to green light, and less to blue.Di2015NewLine    float greyscale = dot(tex.rgb, float3(0.3, 0.59, 0.11));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The input color alpha controls saturation level.Di2015NewLine    tex.rgb = lerp(greyscale, tex.rgb, color.a * 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tex;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20361613Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace DataStructuresDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var buffer = new CircularBuffer<int>(capacity: 3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int value;Di2015NewLine                var input = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (int.TryParse(input, out value))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    buffer.Write(value);Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DataStructuresDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class CircularBuffer<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private T[] _buffer;Di2015NewLine        private int _start;Di2015NewLine        private int _end;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CircularBuffer()Di2015NewLine            : this(capacity: 3)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public CircularBuffer(int capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _buffer = new T[capacity + 1];Di2015NewLine            _start = 0;Di2015NewLine            _end = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Write(T value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _buffer[_end] = value;Di2015NewLine            _end = (_end + 1) % _buffer.Length;Di2015NewLine            if (_end == _start)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _start = (_start + 1) % _buffer.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T Read()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T result = _buffer[_start];Di2015NewLine            _start = (_start + 1) % _buffer.Length;Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CapacityDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _buffer.Length; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsEmptyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _end == _start; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsFullDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return (_end + 1) % _buffer.Length == _start; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20365048Di2015UniqueSeparator protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine {                 Di2015NewLine      ReadXmlFile(Server.MapPath("~/XMLFiles/Items.xml"));Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine private void ReadXmlFile(string fileName)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    string parentElementName = "";Di2015NewLine    string childElementName = "";Di2015NewLine    string childElementValue = "";Di2015NewLine    bool element = false;Di2015NewLine    lblMsg.Text = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    XmlTextReader xReader = new XmlTextReader(fileName);Di2015NewLine    while (xReader.Read())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (xReader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (element)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                parentElementName = parentElementName + childElementName + "<br>";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            element = true;Di2015NewLine            childElementName = xReader.Name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (xReader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Text | xReader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.CDATA)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            element = false;Di2015NewLine            childElementValue = xReader.Value;Di2015NewLine            lblMsg.Text = lblMsg.Text + "<b>" + parentElementName + "<br>" + childElementName + "</b><br>" + childElementValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            parentElementName = "";Di2015NewLine            childElementName = "";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    xReader.Close();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20367379Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SchoolFundRaisingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, List<double>> entries = new Dictionary<string, List<double>>();Di2015NewLine    public void displayContributionsSummary()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Grade \\t Num of Contributions \\t Total Contribution \\t Average contribution");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string key in entries.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<double> contri = entries.FirstOrDefault(k => k.Key == key).Value;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Grade {0} \\t {1}         \\t      {2}              \\t {3}", key, contri.Count, contri.Sum(), contri.Average());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void getContributionsGrades()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int grade = 0;Di2015NewLine        double contribution;Di2015NewLine        while (grade != 999)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Please Enter your grade(6, 7, 8). Enter 999 to quit.");Di2015NewLine            grade = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (grade >= 6 && grade <= 8)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Please Enter the Amount you want to contribute. ");Di2015NewLine                contribution = Convert.ToDouble(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                if (!entries.ContainsKey(grade.ToString()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    List<double> dummyList = new List<double>();Di2015NewLine                    dummyList.Add(contribution);Di2015NewLine                    entries.Add(grade.ToString(), dummyList);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    entries.First(k => k.Key == grade.ToString()).Value.Add(contribution);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (grade == 999)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Done...");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Grade should either be 6,7 or 8");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

20372189Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TestCSharp.OptimizerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic interface IUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    float UnitPrice { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic interface IOrderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int Quantity { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    float GetTotalPrice();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IOrder<T> : IOrder where T : IUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T Unit { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic abstract class AbstractUnit : IUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public float UnitPrice { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Item : AbstractUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Package : AbstractUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<Order<Item>> _items = new List<Order<Item>>();Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<Order<Item>> ItemsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this._items; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Order<T> : IOrder<T> where T : IUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T _unit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Order(T unit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _unit = unit;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Unit { get { return _unit; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Quantity { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public float GetTotalPrice()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _unit.UnitPrice * Quantity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CombinationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<IOrder> _orders = new List<IOrder>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Combination()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Private constructorDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<IOrder> Orders { get { return _orders; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public float GetTotalPrice()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_orders.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _orders.Select(m => m.GetTotalPrice()).Sum();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Combination GetBestCombination(IEnumerable<Order<Item>> intendedItems, IEnumerable<Package> allPacksSetupFromDB)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var potentialCombinations = new List<Combination>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // First comb: treat each item as a standalone IOrder:Di2015NewLine        var com = new Combination();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var ele in intendedItems)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            com.Orders.Add(ele);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        potentialCombinations.Add(com);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // check each possible pack (loaded from db) and find all possible combinationsDi2015NewLine        var possiblePacks = allPacksSetupFromDB.Where(m => m.Items.All(n => (intendedItems.Any(t => t.Unit.Id == n.Unit.Id && t.Quantity >= n.Quantity)))).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        //ToDo: in the possible packages to use, find out all possible combinationsDi2015NewLine        //      This is the tricky part...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The one with lowest price is desired!Di2015NewLine        return potentialCombinations.OrderBy(m => m.GetTotalPrice()).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20372189Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TestCSharp.OptimizerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic interface IUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    float UnitPrice { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic interface IOrderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int Quantity { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    float GetTotalPrice();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IOrder<T> : IOrder where T : IUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T Unit { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic abstract class AbstractUnit : IUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public float UnitPrice { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Item : AbstractUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Package : AbstractUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<Order<Item>> _items = new List<Order<Item>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Items here are required by the package - number of items is specified by the quantity.Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<Order<Item>> ItemsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this._items; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Order<T> : IOrder<T> where T : IUnitDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T _unit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Order(T unit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _unit = unit;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Unit { get { return _unit; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Quantity { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public float GetTotalPrice()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _unit.UnitPrice * Quantity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CombinationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<IOrder> _orders = new List<IOrder>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Combination()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Private constructorDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<IOrder> Orders { get { return _orders; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Get the total number of items ordered (combine package as well)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public Dictionary<int, int> GetItemIdAndQuantity()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var output = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var order in this._orders)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (order is Order<Item>)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var orderedItem = (Order<Item>)order;Di2015NewLine                if (!output.Keys.Contains(orderedItem.Unit.Id))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output.Add(orderedItem.Unit.Id, 0);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                output[orderedItem.Unit.Id] = output[orderedItem.Unit.Id] + ((Order<Item>)order).Quantity;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var orderedPackage = (Order<Package>)order;Di2015NewLine                foreach (var item in orderedPackage.Unit.Items)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var itemId = item.Unit.Id;Di2015NewLine                    if (!output.Keys.Contains(itemId))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        output.Add(itemId, 0);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    output[itemId] = output[itemId] + item.Quantity * orderedPackage.Quantity;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public float GetTotalPrice()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_orders.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _orders.Select(m => m.GetTotalPrice()).Sum();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Combination GetBestCombination(IEnumerable<Order<Item>> intendedItems, IEnumerable<Package> allPacksSetupFromDB)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var potentialCombinations = new List<Combination>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // check each possible pack (loaded from db) and find all possible combinationsDi2015NewLine        // Step 1: for each package, if it could be used potentially, collect it into a listDi2015NewLine        var possibleRanges = new List<PackageUseRange>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var p in allPacksSetupFromDB)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // for each required item in a package, intended items have to fulfill at least one occurrence (with given quantity)Di2015NewLine            if (p.Items.All(n => (intendedItems.Any(t => t.Unit.Id == n.Unit.Id && t.Quantity >= n.Quantity))))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var rng = new PackageUseRange(p);Di2015NewLine                rng.Min = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Find the possible max occurrence of the packageDi2015NewLine                var matchedOrders = intendedItems.Where(x => p.Items.Any(m => m.Unit.Id == x.Unit.Id));Di2015NewLine                rng.Max = matchedOrders.Select(m => m.Quantity / p.Items.First(t => t.Unit.Id == m.Unit.Id).Quantity).Min();Di2015NewLine                possibleRanges.Add(rng);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // By now we should have something like: Di2015NewLine        // package 1: min 0, max 2Di2015NewLine        // package 2: min 0, max 1Di2015NewLine        // package 3: min 0, max 3Di2015NewLine        // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Step 2: find all possible combinations:            Di2015NewLine        if (possibleRanges.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // define a collection to collect combinations Di2015NewLine            // also define a method to clear unwanted combinations. Di2015NewLine            var combinations = new List<Combination>();Di2015NewLine            Action invalidOrderRemover = delegate()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int j = combinations.Count - 1; j >= 0; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var theCom = combinations[j];Di2015NewLine                    var orderedQuantities = theCom.GetItemIdAndQuantity();Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var itemId in orderedQuantities.Keys)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var intended = intendedItems.First(m => m.Unit.Id == itemId).Quantity;Di2015NewLine                        if (orderedQuantities[itemId] > intended)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            combinations.Remove(theCom);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // For first package, let's create orders with different quantitiesDi2015NewLine            var firstPack = possibleRanges[0];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = firstPack.Min; i <= firstPack.Max; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var order = new Order<Package>(firstPack.Package);Di2015NewLine                order.Quantity = i;Di2015NewLine                var com = new Combination();Di2015NewLine                com.Orders.Add(order);Di2015NewLine                combinations.Add(com);Di2015NewLine            }                Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // From second onwards:  Di2015NewLine            //      1. we expand the orders created earlier and collect current pack (with different quantity)Di2015NewLine            //      2. we also take out those impossible combinations so far (total quantity exceeds wanted)Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < possibleRanges.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                invalidOrderRemover.Invoke(); // to avoid the list/array unreasonably largeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // expand orders based on current pack's range:Di2015NewLine                var currPack = possibleRanges[i];Di2015NewLine                var expanded = new List<Combination>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var oldCom in combinations)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int j = currPack.Min; j <= currPack.Max; j++) Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Clone from previous and pick up new ones from existing package. Di2015NewLine                        var newCom = new Combination();Di2015NewLine                        newCom.Orders.AddRange(oldCom.Orders);Di2015NewLine                        var newOrder = new Order<Package>(currPack.Package);Di2015NewLine                        newOrder.Quantity = j;Di2015NewLine                        newCom.Orders.Add(newOrder);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Clear old and add back the expanded:Di2015NewLine                combinations.Clear();Di2015NewLine                combinations.AddRange(expanded);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Clear unwanted again:Di2015NewLine            invalidOrderRemover.Invoke();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add back balanced items:Di2015NewLine            foreach (var cb in combinations)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var fulfilled = cb.GetItemIdAndQuantity();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var item in intendedItems)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!fulfilled.Keys.Contains(item.Unit.Id))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // no such item in any packageDi2015NewLine                        // thus just add new Item based orderDi2015NewLine                        var newOrder = new Order<Item>(item.Unit);Di2015NewLine                        newOrder.Quantity = item.Quantity;Di2015NewLine                        cb.Orders.Add(newOrder);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // check balance:Di2015NewLine                        if (fulfilled[item.Unit.Id] < item.Quantity)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            var newOrder = new Order<Item>(item.Unit);Di2015NewLine                            newOrder.Quantity = item.Quantity - fulfilled[item.Unit.Id];Di2015NewLine                            cb.Orders.Add(newOrder);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add to the final combination collectionDi2015NewLine            potentialCombinations.AddRange(combinations);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Step 3: If there is no package used at all, treat each item as a standalone IOrder:Di2015NewLine        if (!potentialCombinations.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var com = new Combination();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var ele in intendedItems)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                com.Orders.Add(ele);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            potentialCombinations.Add(com);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The one with lowest price is desired!Di2015NewLine        return potentialCombinations.OrderBy(m => m.GetTotalPrice()).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class PackageUseRangeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public PackageUseRange(Package p)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.Package = p;Di2015NewLine            this.Min = 0;Di2015NewLine            this.Max = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Package Package { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Min { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Max { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20372263Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ExampleComparer : IComparer<Example>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string Order = "XQLHPJ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(Example a, Example b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         int indexA = Order.IndexOf(a.GridValue);Di2015NewLine         int indexB = Order.IndexOf(b.GridValue);Di2015NewLine         if (indexA < indexB) { return -1; }Di2015NewLine         else if (indexB > indexA) { return 1; }Di2015NewLine         else { return 0; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

20373291Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ProcessAdditions()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach(var operand in _additions.GetConsumingEnumerable())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _container.Lock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        _container.Operands.Add(operand);Di2015NewLine        _container.Lock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Initialize()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var pump = new Thread(ProcessAdditions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Name = "Operand Additions Pump"Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    pump.Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20373291Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask
20373291Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Task AddNewOperandAsync(Operand operand)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<byte>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Compose an event handler for the completion of this taskDi2015NewLine    NotifyCollectionChangedEventHandler onChanged = null;Di2015NewLine    onChanged = (sender, e) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Is this the event for the operand we have added?Di2015NewLine        if (e.NewItems.Contains(operand))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Complete the task.Di2015NewLine            tcs.SetCompleted(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Remove the event-handler.Di2015NewLine            _container.Operands.CollectionChanged -= onChanged;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Hook in the handler.Di2015NewLine    _container.Operands.CollectionChanged += onChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Perform the addition.Di2015NewLine    _additions.Add(operand);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the task to be awaited.Di2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20380060Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass FTServerCodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   IPEndPoint ipEnd;Di2015NewLine   Socket sock;Di2015NewLine   public FTServerCode()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      ipEnd = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, 5656);Di2015NewLine      sock = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.IP);Di2015NewLine      sock.Bind(ipEnd);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   public static string receivedPath;Di2015NewLine   public static string curMsg = "Stopped";Di2015NewLine   public  void StartServer()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         curMsg = "Starting...";Di2015NewLine         sock.Listen(100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         curMsg = "Running and waiting to receive file.";Di2015NewLine         Socket clientSock = sock.Accept();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         byte[] clientData = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine         StringBuilder sb= new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine         int receivedBytesLen = 0;Di2015NewLine         int fileNameLen = 0;Di2015NewLine         string fileName = "";Di2015NewLine         BinaryWriter bWrite;Di2015NewLine         while((receivedBytesLen =clientSock.Receive(clientData))>0)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            curMsg = "Receiving data..."; ;Di2015NewLine            bWrite.Write(clientData, 4 + fileNameLen, receivedBytesLen - 4 - fileNameLen);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         curMsg = "Saving file...";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         bWrite.Close();Di2015NewLine         clientSock.Close();Di2015NewLine         curMsg = "Reeived & Saved file; Server Stopped.";Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         curMsg = "File Receving error.";Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20380670Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class ReplaceVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public ReplaceVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Expression Replace(this Expression expression,Di2015NewLine    Expression searchEx, Expression replaceEx)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new ReplaceVisitor(searchEx, replaceEx).Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20380670Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T, bool>> CombineExpressions<T>(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Expression<Func<T, bool>>> expressions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (expressions == null || expressions.Count() == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return t => true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "x");Di2015NewLine    var combined = expressionsDi2015NewLine                    .Select(func => func.Body.Replace(func.Parameters[0], param))Di2015NewLine                    .Aggregate((a, b) => Expression.AndAlso(a, b));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(combined, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20380670Di2015UniqueSeparatorOr
20380670Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PredicateBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> True<T>() { return f => true; }Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> False<T>() { return f => false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> Or<T>(this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                        Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var secondBody = expr2.Replace(expr2.Parameters[0], expr1.Parameters[0]);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine              (Expression.OrElse(expr1.Body, secondBody), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> And<T>(this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                         Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var secondBody = expr2.Replace(expr2.Parameters[0], expr1.Parameters[0]);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine              (Expression.AndAlso(expr1.Body, secondBody), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20380670Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<T, bool>> CombineExpressions<T>(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Expression<Func<T, bool>>> expressions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (expressions == null || expressions.Count() == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return t => true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return expressions.Aggregate((a, b) => a.And(b));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20381338Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic GetDataOperationResult<TResult> TryGet<TResult>(Func<TResult> function, int maximumRetryCount, string successText, string undeterminedErrorText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(function != null, "The function input parameter of the DataOperationManager.TryGet<TResult>() method must not be null.");Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < maximumRetryCount; index++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TResult result = function();Di2015NewLine            return new GetDataOperationResult<TResult>(result, successText, undeterminedErrorText);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (index == maximumRetryCount - 1) return new GetDataOperationResult<TResult>(exception, successText, undeterminedErrorText);Di2015NewLine            int sleepCount = GetSleepTime(index, minimumDelay);Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(sleepCount);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    return new GetDataOperationResult<TResult>(default(TResult), successText, undeterminedErrorText);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20387632Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool launchDebugger()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get System directory, typically c:\\windows\\system32Di2015NewLine    std::wstring systemDir(MAX_PATH+1, '\\0');Di2015NewLine    UINT nChars = GetSystemDirectoryW(&systemDir[0], systemDir.length());Di2015NewLine    if (nChars == 0) return false; // failed to get system directoryDi2015NewLine    systemDir.resize(nChars);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get process ID and create the command lineDi2015NewLine    DWORD pid = GetCurrentProcessId();Di2015NewLine    std::wostringstream s;Di2015NewLine    s << systemDir << L"\\\\vsjitdebugger.exe -p " << pid;Di2015NewLine    std::wstring cmdLine = s.str();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Start debugger processDi2015NewLine    STARTUPINFOW si;Di2015NewLine    ZeroMemory(&si, sizeof(si));Di2015NewLine    si.cb = sizeof(si);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PROCESS_INFORMATION pi;Di2015NewLine    ZeroMemory(&pi, sizeof(pi));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!CreateProcessW(NULL, &cmdLine[0], NULL, NULL, FALSE, 0, NULL, NULL, &si, &pi)) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Close debugger process handles to eliminate resource leakDi2015NewLine    CloseHandle(pi.hThread);Di2015NewLine    CloseHandle(pi.hProcess);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Wait for the debugger to attachDi2015NewLine    while (!IsDebuggerPresent()) Sleep(100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Stop execution so the debugger can take overDi2015NewLine    DebugBreak();Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20391026Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class NativeMethodsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int MAX_PATH = 260;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Force unicode version to get long-path supportDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Unicode, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    static extern uint GetShortPathNameW(Di2015NewLine            [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPTStr)]Di2015NewLine            string lpszLongPath,Di2015NewLine            [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPTStr)]Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder lpszShortPath,Di2015NewLine            uint cchBufferDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string ShortenPath(string longPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // check if path is already short enoughDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(longPath) || longPath.Length <= MAX_PATH)Di2015NewLine            return longPath;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get short version of path Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder shortNameBuffer = new StringBuilder(MAX_PATH);Di2015NewLine        uint result = GetShortPathNameW(@"\\\\?\\" + longPath, shortNameBuffer, (uint)MAX_PATH);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // result is length of returned path.  Must be >4 bytes to be validDi2015NewLine        if (result <= 4)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get result, removing "\\\\?\\" prefixDi2015NewLine        var res = shortNameBuffer.ToString().Substring(4);Di2015NewLine        return res;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20397981Di2015UniqueSeparatorUrl.Action
20397981Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string NonContextualAction(this UrlHelper helper, string action)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return helper.NonContextualAction(action,Di2015NewLine        helper.RequestContext.RouteData.Values["controller"].ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string NonContextualAction(this UrlHelper helper, string action,Di2015NewLine                                         string controller)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var routeValues = helper.RequestContext.RouteData.Values;Di2015NewLine    var routeValueKeys = routeValues.Keys.Where(o => o != "controller"Di2015NewLine                         && o != "action").ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Temporarily remove routevaluesDi2015NewLine    var oldRouteValues = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var key in routeValueKeys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        oldRouteValues[key] = routeValues[key];Di2015NewLine        routeValues.Remove(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get static page contentDi2015NewLine    string url = helper.Action(routeValues["Action"].ToString(),Di2015NewLine                               routeValues["Controller"].ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Reinsert routevaluesDi2015NewLine    foreach (var kvp in oldRouteValues)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        routeValues.Add(kvp.Key, kvp.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return url;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20398036Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static MvcHtmlString LabelHelper(HtmlHelper html, ModelMetadata metadata,Di2015NewLine               string htmlFieldName, string labelText = null, Di2015NewLine               IDictionary<string, object> htmlAttributes = null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string resolvedLabelText = labelText ?? metadata.DisplayName Di2015NewLine                 ?? metadata.PropertyName Di2015NewLine                 ?? htmlFieldName.Split('.').Last();Di2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(resolvedLabelText))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return MvcHtmlString.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TagBuilder tag = new TagBuilder("label");Di2015NewLine            tag.Attributes.Add("for", TagBuilder.CreateSanitizedId(Di2015NewLine                html.ViewContext.ViewData.TemplateInfo.GetFullHtmlFieldName(htmlFieldName)));Di2015NewLine            tag.SetInnerText(resolvedLabelText);Di2015NewLine            tag.MergeAttributes(htmlAttributes, replaceExisting: true);Di2015NewLine            return tag.ToMvcHtmlString(TagRenderMode.Normal);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

20401626Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var existingElements  = new List<int> { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 };Di2015NewLine        var elementsToAdd = new List<int> { 100, 101, 102 };Di2015NewLine        existingElements = existingElements.Mix(elementsToAdd).ToList();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(String.Join(", ", existingElements));Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionMethodsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> Mix<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, IEnumerable<T> mix)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var list1 = source.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        var list2 = mix.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        var total = list1.Count() + list2.Count();Di2015NewLine        var skip = (list1.Count() / list2.Count()) + 1;Di2015NewLine        var count1 = 0;Di2015NewLine        var count2 = 0;Di2015NewLine        var finalList = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < total; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var count = i + 1;Di2015NewLine            if (count % skip == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                finalList.Add(list2[count2]);Di2015NewLine                count2++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                finalList.Add(list1[count1]);Di2015NewLine                count1++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return finalList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20401631Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void dfs(int vertex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int length = matrix.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine    bool[] visited = new bool[length];Di2015NewLine    for (int k = 0; k < length; k++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        visited[k] = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Stack<int> vertexStack = new Stack<int>();Di2015NewLine    vertexStack.Push(vertex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (vertexStack.Count() != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int tempVertex = vertexStack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        if (!visited[tempVertex])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            visited[tempVertex] = true;Di2015NewLine            Console.Write((tempVertex) + " ");Di2015NewLine            for (int j = length - 1; j >= 0; j--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (matrix[tempVertex, j] == 1 && !visited[j])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    vertexStack.Push(j);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20405981Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate CancellationTokenSource ts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Start()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    System.Timers.Timer t = new System.Timers.Timer();Di2015NewLine    t.Interval = 200;Di2015NewLine    t.Elapsed += (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ts.Token.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // another thread decided to cancelDi2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine("task canceled");Di2015NewLine            t.Stop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    t.Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Stop()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Can't wait anymore => cancel this task Di2015NewLine    ts.Cancel();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20406065Di2015UniqueSeparatorPath.DirectorySeparatorChar
20406065Di2015UniqueSeparatorPath.AltDirectorySeparatorChar
20406065Di2015UniqueSeparator\\
20406065Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring PathAddBackslash(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // They're always one character but EndsWith is shorter thanDi2015NewLine    // array style access to last path character. Change thisDi2015NewLine    // if performance are a (measured) issue.Di2015NewLine    const string separator1 = Path.DirectorySeparatorChar.ToString();Di2015NewLine    const string separator2 = Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // White spaces are always ignored (both heading and trailing)Di2015NewLine    path = path.Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Argument is always a directory name then if there is oneDi2015NewLine    // of allowed separators then I have nothing to do.Di2015NewLine    if (path.EndsWidth(separator1) || path.EndsWith(separator2))Di2015NewLine        return path;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If there is the "alt" separator then I add a trailing one.Di2015NewLine    if (path.Contains(separator2))Di2015NewLine        return path + separator2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If there is not an "alt" separator I add a "normal" one.Di2015NewLine    // It means path may be with normal one or it has not any separatorDi2015NewLine    // (for example if it's just a directory name). In this case IDi2015NewLine    // default to normal as users expect.Di2015NewLine    return path + separator1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20406065Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport("shlwapi.dll", Di2015NewLine EntryPoint = "PathAddBackslashW",Di2015NewLine SetLastError = True,Di2015NewLine CharSet = CharSet.Unicode)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern IntPtr PathAddBackslash(Di2015NewLine    [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPTStr)]StringBuilder lpszPath);Di2015NewLine

20406074Di2015UniqueSeparator   IQueryable<Rate> query = from r in RatesDi2015NewLine                            where r.IsRetired == false && r.EffectiveDate <= dateNowDi2015NewLine                            group r by r.RateTypeID into rgDi2015NewLine                            select rg.OrderByDescending(r => r.EffectiveDate).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine
20406074Di2015UniqueSeparatorDim result = (Di2015NewLine    From r In RatesDi2015NewLine    Where r.IsRetired = False And r.EffectiveDate <= dateNowDi2015NewLine    Group r By r.RateTypeIDDi2015NewLine    Into rg = GroupDi2015NewLine    Select rg.OrderByDescending(Function(r) r.EffectiveDate).FirstOrDefault()Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine
20406202Di2015UniqueSeparatorBuffer.BLockCopy()
20406202Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum CameraPosDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TopLeft = 0,Di2015NewLine    TopRight = 1,Di2015NewLine    BottomLeft = 2,Di2015NewLine    BottomRight = 3Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int W=360, H=288;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var BaseImage=new short[2*W, 2*H, 3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Initialize sequential numbers so I can debug the results easier.Di2015NewLine        short num=0;Di2015NewLine        for (int x=0; x<2*W; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int y=0; y<2*H; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // num = color + 3*( y+576*x )Di2015NewLine                BaseImage[x, y, 0]=num++;Di2015NewLine                BaseImage[x, y, 1]=num++;Di2015NewLine                BaseImage[x, y, 2]=num++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var NewImage=new short[2*W, 2*H, 3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CopySubImage(BaseImage, NewImage, CameraPos.TopRight);Di2015NewLine        // this copied x=360..719 and y=0..287Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void CopySubImage(short[, ,] base_image, short[, ,] new_image, CameraPos cam_index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int W=base_image.GetLength(0)/2;Di2015NewLine        int H=base_image.GetLength(1)/2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int x_index=((int)cam_index%2)*W;  // either 0 or 360Di2015NewLine        // int y_index=((int)cam_index/2)*H;  // either 0 or 288 (not needed)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy columns with Buffer.BlockCopy. Shown below are the flat array indeces.Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // | 3*(0+576*0) 3*(0+576*1) .. 3*(0+576*359) | 3*(0+576*360)   .. 3*(0+576*719)   |Di2015NewLine        // | 3*(1+576*0) 3*(1+576*1) .. 3*(1+576*359) | 3*(1+576*360)   .. 3*(1+576*719)   |Di2015NewLine        // |     ..                           ..      |       ..               ..          |Di2015NewLine        // | 3*(287+576*0)      ..    3*(287+576*359) | 3*(287+576*360) .. 3*(287+576*719) |Di2015NewLine        // + ---------------------------------------- + ---------------------------------- +Di2015NewLine        // | 3*(288+576*0)      ..    3*(288+576*359) | 3*(288+576*360) .. 3*(288+576*719) |Di2015NewLine        // |     ..                           ..      |       ..               ..          |Di2015NewLine        // | 3*(575+576*0)      ..    3*(575+576*359) | 3*(575+576*360) .. 3*(575+576*719) |Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int x=x_index; x<x_index+W; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int k_start=3*(y_index+2*H*x);Di2015NewLine            //int k_end=3*(x_index+W+720*y); (not needed)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(base_image, k_start, new_image, k_start, 3*H*sizeof(short));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20410633Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Expression<Func<TFirstParam, TResult>>Di2015NewLine    Compose<TFirstParam, TIntermediate, TResult>(Di2015NewLine    this Expression<Func<TFirstParam, TIntermediate>> first,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<TIntermediate, TResult>> second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TFirstParam), "param");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var newFirst = first.Body.Replace(first.Parameters[0], param);Di2015NewLine    var newSecond = second.Body.Replace(second.Parameters[0], newFirst);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TFirstParam, TResult>>(newSecond, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20414398Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Program {Di2015NewLine    public static void Main() {Di2015NewLine        var dynamicTest = new DynamicMethodTest();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(dynamicTest.Evaluate(15)); // FalseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dynamicTest.PerformInjection("if (number > 5) { return true; } else { return false; }");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(dynamicTest.Evaluate(15)); // TrueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20414538Di2015UniqueSeparatorMarshal.SizeOf
20414538Di2015UniqueSeparatorMarshal.PtrToStructure
20414538Di2015UniqueSeparator#Code from 4.5Di2015NewLinedynamic dynamicVar = ...Di2015NewLineobject boxedStruct = Marshal.PtrToStructure(myPtr, dynamicVar.GetType());Di2015NewLine// Above resolves to 'object Marshal.PtrToStructure(IntPtr, Type)' in 4.5Di2015NewLine// and resolves to 'void Marshal.PtrToStructure<T>(IntPtr, T)' in 4.5.1Di2015NewLineint size = Marshal.SizeOf(dynamicVar.GetType());Di2015NewLine// Above resolves to 'object Marshal.SizeOf(Type)' in 4.5Di2015NewLine// and resolves to 'void Marshal.SizeOf<T>(T)' in 4.5.1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#Fixed for 4.5.1Di2015NewLinedynamic dynamicVar = ...Di2015NewLineobject boxedStruct = Marshal.PtrToStructure(myPtr, (Type)dynamicVar.GetType());Di2015NewLine// Adding the cast forces the code to resolve toDi2015NewLine// 'object Marshal.PtrToStructure(IntPtr, Type)'Di2015NewLineint size = Marshal.SizeOf((Type)dynamicVar.GetType());Di2015NewLine// Adding the cast forces the code to resolve toDi2015NewLine// 'int Marshal.SizeOf(Type)'Di2015NewLine
