20414910Di2015UniqueSeparator"MS"
20414910Di2015UniqueSeparator"M-"
20414910Di2015UniqueSeparator    if (ButtonText == "MS")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemoryStore = Decimal.Parse(txtDisplay.Text);Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (ButtonText == "M-")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Memory subtractDi2015NewLine        MemoryStore -= EndResult;Di2015NewLine        txtDisplay.Text = MemoryStore.ToString();Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (ButtonText == "M+")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Memory add Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemoryStore += EndResult;Di2015NewLine        txtDisplay.Text = MemoryStore.ToString();Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
20414947Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class Iso8601FormatsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 extended time format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] TimeExtended;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 basic time format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] TimeBasic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 both basic and extended time format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] Time;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 extended date format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] DateExtended;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 basic date format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] DateBasic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 both basic and extended time format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] Date;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 extended date and time format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] DateAndTimeExtended;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 basic date and time format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] DateAndTimeBasic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 both basic and extended date and time format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>        Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] DateAndTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 extended date and/or time format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] DateAndOrTimeExtended;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 basic date and/or time format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] DateAndOrTimeBasic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Represents ISO 8601 both basic and extended date and/or time format.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly string[] DateAndOrTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Iso8601Formats()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // date format extendedDi2015NewLine        IList<string> dateExtended = new List<string>{Di2015NewLine                                      "yyyy'-'MM'-'dd"  // 1985-04-12Di2015NewLine                                  };Di2015NewLine        DateExtended = dateExtended.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // date format basicDi2015NewLine        IList<string> dateBasic = new List<string>{Di2015NewLine                                      "yyyyMMdd"        // 19850412Di2015NewLine                                      ,"yyyy'-'MM"      // 1985-04Di2015NewLine                                      ,"yyyy"           // 1985Di2015NewLine                                      ,"'--'MMdd"       // --0412Di2015NewLine                                      ,"'---'dd"        // ---12Di2015NewLine                                  };Di2015NewLine        DateBasic = dateBasic.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // date both basic and extended formatDi2015NewLine        List<string> date = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        date.AddRange(dateBasic);Di2015NewLine        date.AddRange(dateExtended);Di2015NewLine        Date = date.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // time format extendedDi2015NewLine        IList<string> timeExtended = new List<string>{                                          Di2015NewLine                                      "HH':'mm':'sszzz"       // 10:22:00-0800Di2015NewLine                                      ,"HH':'mm':'sszz"       // 10:22:00-08Di2015NewLine                                      ,"HH':'mm':'ssZ"        // 10:22:00ZDi2015NewLine                                      ,"HH':'mm':'ss"         // 10:22:05Di2015NewLine                                      ,"HH':'mm"              // 10:22Di2015NewLine                                      ,"HH"                   // 10Di2015NewLine                                      ,"'-:'mm':'ss"          // -22:07Di2015NewLine                                      ,"'-:-:'ss"             // -:-:07Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        TimeExtended = timeExtended.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // time format basicDi2015NewLine        IList<string> timeBasic = new List<string>{                                          Di2015NewLine                                      "HHmmsszzz"       // 102200-0800Di2015NewLine                                      ,"HHmmsszz"       // 102200-08Di2015NewLine                                      ,"HHmmssZ"        // 102200ZDi2015NewLine                                      ,"HHmmss"         // 102205Di2015NewLine                                      ,"HHmm"           // 1022Di2015NewLine                                      ,"HH"             // 10Di2015NewLine                                      ,"'-'mmss"        // -2207Di2015NewLine                                      ,"'--'ss"         // --07Di2015NewLine                                  };Di2015NewLine        TimeBasic = timeBasic.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // time format both basic and extendedDi2015NewLine        List<string> time = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        time.AddRange(timeBasic);Di2015NewLine        time.AddRange(timeExtended);Di2015NewLine        Time = time.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // date-time basicDi2015NewLine        IList<string> dateTimeBasic = Di2015NewLine            CombineFormats(dateBasic, timeBasic);Di2015NewLine        DateAndTimeBasic = dateTimeBasic.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // date-time extendedDi2015NewLine        IList<string> dateTimeExtended = Di2015NewLine            CombineFormats(dateExtended, timeExtended);Di2015NewLine        DateAndTimeExtended = dateTimeExtended.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // date-time both basic and extendedDi2015NewLine        List<string> dateTime = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        dateTime.AddRange(dateTimeBasic);Di2015NewLine        dateTime.AddRange(dateTimeExtended);Di2015NewLine        DateAndTime = dateTime.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // date-and-or-time basic formatDi2015NewLine        List<string> dateAndOrTimeBasic = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        dateAndOrTimeBasic.AddRange(dateTimeBasic);Di2015NewLine        dateAndOrTimeBasic.AddRange(dateBasic);Di2015NewLine        foreach (string timeFormat in timeBasic)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dateAndOrTimeBasic.Add("'T'" + timeFormat);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        DateAndOrTimeBasic = dateAndOrTimeBasic.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // date-and-or-time extended formatDi2015NewLine        List<string> dateAndOrTimeExtended = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        dateAndOrTimeExtended.AddRange(dateTimeExtended);Di2015NewLine        dateAndOrTimeExtended.AddRange(dateExtended);Di2015NewLine        foreach (string timeFormat in timeExtended)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dateAndOrTimeExtended.Add("'T'" + timeFormat);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        DateAndOrTimeExtended = dateAndOrTimeExtended.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // date-and-or-time basic and extended formatDi2015NewLine        List<string> dateAndOrTime = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        dateAndOrTime.AddRange(dateAndOrTimeBasic);Di2015NewLine        dateAndOrTime.AddRange(dateAndOrTimeExtended);Di2015NewLine        DateAndOrTime = dateAndOrTime.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Produces all combinations of date and time formatsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dates">List of dates formats</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="times">List of time formats</param>Di2015NewLine    private static IList<string> CombineFormats(IList<string> dates, IList<string> times)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> dt = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (string dateFormat in dates)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (string timeFormat in times)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // year/month must be present if time zone is specifiedDi2015NewLine                if (dateFormat.StartsWith("'-") && (timeFormat.IndexOfAny(new[] { 'z', 'Z' }) != -1))Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                dt.Add(dateFormat + "'T'" + timeFormat);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return dt;Di2015NewLine 20418736Di2015UniqueSeparatorOutcome[] outcomes = new[] { new Outcome { White = 0, Black = 0 },Di2015NewLine                             new Outcome { White = 1, Black = 0 },Di2015NewLine                             // ... all other possibilitiesDi2015NewLine                            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// assume we have some list of combinationsDi2015NewLineint min = Integer.MaxValue;Di2015NewLineCombination minCombination = null;Di2015NewLineforeach (var guess in combinations)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int max = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var outcome in outcomes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var count = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var solution in combinations)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Check(guess, solution) == outcome)Di2015NewLine                count++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (count > max)Di2015NewLine            max = count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (max < min)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        min = max;Di2015NewLine        minCombination = guess;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20420082Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RegisterPrintKey : IDisposable {Di2015NewLine  ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This class can allocate the Window Handle resource (HWND)Di2015NewLineprivate class HotKeyWndProc : NativeWindow {Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Explicit resource (HWND) allocationDi2015NewLineprivate HotKeyWndProc m_HotKeyWnd = new HotKeyWndProc();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// I'd rather make a property from your "hasDisposed" field:Di2015NewLine//   - it's make easier to check instance's state (esp. while debugging)Di2015NewLine//   - IsDisposed is more popular name for thisDi2015NewLinepublic Boolean IsDisposed {Di2015NewLine  get;Di2015NewLine  protected set; // <- or even "private set"Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected virtual void Dispose(Boolean dispose) {Di2015NewLine  if (IsDisposed)Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (disposed) {Di2015NewLine    // Release any Objects hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // You've allocated the HWND resource so you have to dispose it: Di2015NewLine    m_HotKeyWnd.DestroyHandle(); // <- Free HWND you've createdDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Here, you may work with structures only!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // You don't need these assignments, but you can safely do them:Di2015NewLine  // mayhaps, they'll be useful for you while debugging Di2015NewLine  m_WindowHandle = IntPtr.Zero; Di2015NewLine  m_Keys = null; Di2015NewLine  m_ModKey = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Finally, we've done with disposing the instanceDi2015NewLine  IsDisposed = true; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Dispose() {Di2015NewLine  Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine  // We've done with Dispose: "GC, please, don't bother the disposed instance"Di2015NewLine  GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// A treacherous enemy I've commented out: Di2015NewLine// if you've made a error in Dispose() it'll be resource leak Di2015NewLine// or something like AccessViolation. The only good thing is thatDi2015NewLine// you can easily reproduce (and fix) the problem.Di2015NewLine// If you've uncommented ~RegisterPrintKey() this leak/EAV will becomeDi2015NewLine// floating error: it'll appear and disappear on different workstationsDi2015NewLine// OSs etc: you can't control GC when to run. Floating error isDi2015NewLine// much harder to detect.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Another bad issue with finalizer is that it prevents the instance Di2015NewLine// from being in zero generation, seeDi2015NewLine// http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12991692/why-doesnt-object-with-finalizer-get-collected-even-if-it-is-unrootedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//~RegisterPrintKey() {Di2015NewLine//   // This code can be called (if called!) at random timeDi2015NewLine//   Dispose(false); // <- That's an enemy! Di2015NewLine// }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20422505Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Image ResizeImage(Image image, Size size, bool preserveAspectRatio = true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int newWidth;Di2015NewLine        int newHeight;Di2015NewLine        if (preserveAspectRatio)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var originalWidth = image.Width;Di2015NewLine            var originalHeight = image.Height;Di2015NewLine            var percentWidth = size.Width / (float)originalWidth;Di2015NewLine            var percentHeight = size.Height / (float)originalHeight;Di2015NewLine            var percent = percentHeight < percentWidth ? percentHeight : percentWidth;Di2015NewLine            newWidth = (int)(originalWidth * percent);Di2015NewLine            newHeight = (int)(originalHeight * percent);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            newWidth = size.Width;Di2015NewLine            newHeight = size.Height;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Image newImage = new Bitmap(newWidth, newHeight);Di2015NewLine        using (var graphicsHandle = Graphics.FromImage(newImage))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            graphicsHandle.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine            graphicsHandle.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            graphicsHandle.PixelOffsetMode = PixelOffsetMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            graphicsHandle.DrawImage(image, 0, 0, newWidth, newHeight);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return newImage;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20434192Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupWhile<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<T> list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (predicate(previous, iterator.Current))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                list.Add(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return list;Di2015NewLine                list = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            previous = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20434762Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyMultiValueConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // perform your conversion here and return the final valueDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20434776Di2015UniqueSeparator # MS-Windows  "Notepad.exe Word Wrap" simulationDi2015NewLine # ( N = 16 )Di2015NewLine # ============================Di2015NewLine # Find:     @"(?:((?>.{1,16}(?:(?<=[^\\S\\r\\n])[^\\S\\r\\n]?|(?=\\r?\\n)|$|[^\\S\\r\\n]))|.{1,16})(?:\\r?\\n)?|(?:\\r?\\n|$))"Di2015NewLine # Replace:  @"$1\\r\\n"Di2015NewLine # Flags:    Global     Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine # Note - Through trial and error discovery, it apparears Notepad accepts an extra whitespaceDi2015NewLine # (possibly in the N+1 position) to help alignment. This matters not because thier viewport hides it.Di2015NewLine # There is no trimming of any whitespace, so the wrapped buffer could be reconstituted by inserting/detecting aDi2015NewLine # wrap point code which is different than a linebreak.Di2015NewLine # This regex works on un-wrapped source, but could probably be adjusted to produce/work on wrapped buffer text.Di2015NewLine # To reconstitute the source all that is needed is to remove the wrap code which is probably just an extra "\\r".Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine (?:Di2015NewLine      # -- Words/Characters Di2015NewLine      (                       # (1 start)Di2015NewLine           (?>                     # Atomic Group - Match words with valid breaksDi2015NewLine                .{1,16}                 #  1-N charactersDi2015NewLine                                        #  Followed by one of 4 prioritized, non-linebreak whitespaceDi2015NewLine                (?:                     #  break types:Di2015NewLine                     (?<= [^\\S\\r\\n] )        # 1. - Behind a non-linebreak whitespaceDi2015NewLine                     [^\\S\\r\\n]?              #      ( optionally accept an extra non-linebreak whitespace )Di2015NewLine                  |  (?= \\r? \\n )            # 2. - Ahead a linebreakDi2015NewLine                  |  $                       # 3. - EOSDi2015NewLine                  |  [^\\S\\r\\n]               # 4. - Accept an extra non-linebreak whitespaceDi2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine           )                       # End atomic groupDi2015NewLine        |  Di2015NewLine           .{1,16}                 # No valid word breaks, just break on the N'th characterDi2015NewLine      )                       # (1 end)Di2015NewLine      (?: \\r? \\n )?           # Optional linebreak after Words/CharactersDi2015NewLine   |  Di2015NewLine      # -- Or, LinebreakDi2015NewLine      (?: \\r? \\n | $ )        # Stand alone linebreak or at EOSDi2015NewLine )Di2015NewLine
20434776Di2015UniqueSeparator $/ = undef;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine $string1 = <DATA>;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine $string1 =~ s/(?:((?>.{1,16}(?:(?<=[^\\S\\r\\n])[^\\S\\r\\n]?|(?=\\r?\\n)|$|[^\\S\\r\\n]))|.{1,16})(?:\\r?\\n)?|(?:\\r?\\n|$))/$1\\r\\n/g;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine print $string1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine __DATA__Di2015NewLine hhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhDi2015NewLine bbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbEDIT FOR CLARITY - I                    know there are  ways to do this in   multiple steps, or using LINQ or vanilla C#Di2015NewLine string manipulation. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine The reason I am using a single regex call, is because I wanted practice. with complexDi2015NewLine regex patterns. - END EDITDi2015NewLine pppppppppppppppppppUfDi2015NewLine
20434776Di2015UniqueSeparator hhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhDi2015NewLine hhhhhhhhhhhhhhhDi2015NewLine bbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbDi2015NewLine EDIT FOR CLARITY Di2015NewLine - I              Di2015NewLine       know there Di2015NewLine are  ways to do Di2015NewLine this in   Di2015NewLine multiple steps, Di2015NewLine or using LINQ or Di2015NewLine vanilla C#Di2015NewLine string Di2015NewLine manipulation. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine The reason I am Di2015NewLine using a single Di2015NewLine regex call, is Di2015NewLine because I wanted Di2015NewLine practice. with Di2015NewLine complexDi2015NewLine regex patterns. Di2015NewLine - END EDITDi2015NewLine ppppppppppppppppDi2015NewLine pppUfDi2015NewLine

20435454Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringBuilder source = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLinesource.AppendLine("using System;");Di2015NewLinesource.AppendLine("using System.ServiceModel;");Di2015NewLinesource.AppendLine("[ServiceContract]");Di2015NewLinesource.AppendLine("public class DynamicService {");Di2015NewLine// Here for each MethodInfo from list generate a method source likeDi2015NewLineforeach (var method in methods)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (method.ReturnType == typeof(void))Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLine    string parameters = string.Join(", ", method.GetParameters().Select(pi => string.Format("{0} {1}", pi.ParameterType.Name, pi.Name)));Di2015NewLine    string arguments = string.Join(", ", method.GetParameters().Select(pi => pi.Name));Di2015NewLine    source.AppendFormat("[OperationContract]");Di2015NewLine    source.AppendFormat("public {0} {1}({2})", method.ReturnType.Name, method.Name, parameters);Di2015NewLine    source.AppendFormat("{{   return ConsoleApplication.Helpers.{0}({1}); }}", method.Name, arguments);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinesource.AppendLine("}");Di2015NewLine

20442035Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create the cancelation token, when we don't get any feedback from server within 20 secondsDi2015NewLinevar cancelHeadersToken = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLinecancelHeadersToken.CancelAfter(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(20)); // if we don't receive server headers after 20 seconds then something went wrongDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// We have another cancelation token, that allows the user to cancel the request, so here we create a linked token source which uses both tokensDi2015NewLinevar linkedToken = CancellationTokenSource.CreateLinkedTokenSource(userCancelToken, cancelHeadersToken.Token);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The linked token is then used in GetAsync and we use the overload which allows to specify the HttpCompletionOptionDi2015NewLine// We only want to receive headers and not all contentDi2015NewLinevar httpMessage = await customClient.CustomizedHttpClient.GetAsync(address, HttpCompletionOption.ResponseHeadersRead, linkedToken.Token).ConfigureAwait(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// We can then download the content, and we still allow to cancel anything by the userDi2015NewLineusing (var memoryStream = new MemoryStream(100000)) { // 100ko by defaultDi2015NewLine    using (var stream = await httpMessage.Content.ReadAsStreamAsync().ConfigureAwait(false)) {Di2015NewLine        await stream.CopyToAsync(memoryStream, 10000, userCancelToken).ConfigureAwait(false); // copy to memory stream 10ko per 10koDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string data = "";Di2015NewLine    if (memoryStream.Length > 0) {Di2015NewLine        var headers = httpMessage.Content.Headers;Di2015NewLine        Encoding encoding;Di2015NewLine        if (headers != null && headers.ContentType != null && headers.ContentType.CharSet != null) {Di2015NewLine            encoding = Encoding.GetEncoding(headers.ContentType.CharSet);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            encoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        data = encoding.GetString(memoryStream.GetBuffer(), 0, (int)memoryStream.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Then you do whatever you want with dataDi2015NewLine}               Di2015NewLine

20442612Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class EnumerableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<DateTime>> GetConsecutiveDays(this IEnumerable<DateTime> data,Di2015NewLine                                                                        int consecutiveDayCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (data == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("data");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (consecutiveDayCount < 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("consecutiveDayCount should be greater than 1");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var days = data.Select(item => item.Date).Distinct().OrderBy(item => item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return days.Select((day, index) => days.Skip(index).Take(consecutiveDayCount).ToList())Di2015NewLine                   .Where(group => group.First().AddDays(consecutiveDayCount - 1) == group.Last());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20458000Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate async Task<T> LoadJSONToObject<T>(string url, string rootProperty)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //get dataDi2015NewLine    var json = await GetResultStringAsync(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(rootProperty))Di2015NewLine        return JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<T>(json);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var jObject = JObject.Parse(json);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var parsedJson = jObject[rootProperty].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //deserialize itDi2015NewLine    return JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<T>(parsedJson);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20458062Di2015UniqueSeparatorpredicate.Body
20458062Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConvertExpressionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class BusinessObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class DataObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class ExpressionConverter : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Expression Convert(Expression expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Visit(expr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private ParameterExpression replaceParam;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitLambda<T>(Expression<T> node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (typeof(T) == typeof(Func<BusinessObject, bool>))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                replaceParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(DataObject), "p");Di2015NewLine                return Expression.Lambda<Func<DataObject, bool>>(Visit(node.Body), replaceParam);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return base.VisitLambda<T>(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (node.Type == typeof(BusinessObject))Di2015NewLine                return replaceParam; // Expression.Parameter(typeof(DataObject), "p");Di2015NewLine            return base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitMember(MemberExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (node.Member.DeclaringType == typeof(BusinessObject))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var member = typeof(DataObject).GetMember(node.Member.Name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public | System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine                if (member == null)Di2015NewLine                    throw new InvalidOperationException("Cannot identify corresponding member of DataObject");Di2015NewLine                return Expression.MakeMemberAccess(Visit(node.Expression), member);Di2015NewLine 20458488Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stereo[] stereos = File.OpenRead(@"C:\\Example\\MultiChannelSong.bin"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           newStereos = Stereo.Deseralize(readStream);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class StereoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Samples;Di2015NewLine    public float[] L, R;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Stereo(int N)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Samples = N;Di2015NewLine        L = new float[N];Di2015NewLine        R = new float[N];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Serialize(Stereo[] stereos, Stream destination)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (BinaryWriter writer = new BinaryWriter(destination, Encoding.Default, true))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Write the size of the array to the fileDi2015NewLine            writer.Write(stereos.LongLength);Di2015NewLine            foreach (Stereo stereo in stereos)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Write the number of samples there areDi2015NewLine                writer.Write(stereo.Samples);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Write out the L channelDi2015NewLine                foreach (var l in stereo.L)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    writer.Write(l);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Write out the R channelDi2015NewLine                foreach (var r in stereo.R)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    writer.Write(r);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Stereo[] Deseralize(Stream source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (BinaryReader reader = new BinaryReader(source, Encoding.Default, true))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Read in the number of recordsDi2015NewLine            var records = reader.ReadInt64();Di2015NewLine            Stereo[] stereos = new Stereo[records];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (long i = 0; i < records; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Read in the number of samplesDi2015NewLine                var samples = reader.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLine                var stereo = new Stereo(samples);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Read in the L channelDi2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < samples; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    stereo.L[j] = reader.ReadSingle();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Read in the R channelDi2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < samples; j++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    stereo.R[j] = reader.ReadSingle();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Set the sterieo object we created in to the array.Di2015NewLine                stereos[i] = stereo;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return stereos;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20461295Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate async void btnStart_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var progress = new Progress<string>(value => { txtResult1.Text = value; });Di2015NewLine  await Task.WhenAll(ReadCharacterAsync("C:\\\\File 1.txt", progress),Di2015NewLine      ReadCharacterAsync("C:\\\\File 2.txt", progress),Di2015NewLine      ReadCharacterAsync("C:\\\\File 3.txt", progress));Di2015NewLine  MessageBox.Show("Done");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate async Task ReadCharacterAsync(string inputFile, IProgress<string> progress)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string result; string TID;Di2015NewLine    using (var inFile = new FileStream(inputFile, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.None, 8192, useAsync: true))Di2015NewLine    using (var outFile = new FileStream(string.Format("{0}--Out.txt", inputFile.Replace(".txt","")), FileMode.Create, FileAccess.ReadWrite, FileShare.None, 8192, useAsync: true))Di2015NewLine    using (StreamReader sr =new StreamReader(inFile))Di2015NewLine    using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(outFile))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TID = "Thread ID: "+ Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId.ToString();Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine(TID);Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine("T Start : " + DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString() + "." + Di2015NewLine                DateTime.Now.Millisecond).ToString();Di2015NewLine        while (!sr.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = await sr.ReadLineAsync();Di2015NewLine            await sw.WriteLineAsync(result);Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        progress.Report(Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine("T Stop : "+DateTime.Now.ToLongTimeString() + "." + Di2015NewLine                DateTime.Now.Millisecond).ToString());Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20461655Di2015UniqueSeparatorApplication.DoEvents()
20461655Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class WaitExtDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Wait for a handle and pump messages with DoEventsDi2015NewLine        /// by noseratio - http://stackoverflow.com/a/20461655/1768303Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static bool WaitWithDoEvents(this WaitHandle handle, CancellationToken token, int timeout)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (SynchronizationContext.Current as System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // http://stackoverflow.com/a/19555959Di2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException("Internal error: WaitWithDoEvents must be called on a thread with WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            const uint EVENT_MASK = Win32.QS_ALLINPUT;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr[] handles = { handle.SafeWaitHandle.DangerousGetHandle() };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // track timeout if not infiniteDi2015NewLine            Func<bool> hasTimedOut = () => false;Di2015NewLine            int remainingTimeout = timeout;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (timeout != Timeout.Infinite)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // can't use Environment.TickCount, it is integer and may have a problem with timer wrappingDi2015NewLine                uint startTick = Win32.GetTickCount();Di2015NewLine                hasTimedOut = () =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var lapse = unchecked((int)(Win32.GetTickCount() - startTick));Di2015NewLine                    remainingTimeout = Math.Max(timeout - lapse, 0);Di2015NewLine                    return remainingTimeout == 0;Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                token.ThrowIfCancellationRequested(); // throw if cancellation requested from outsideDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (handle.WaitOne(0)) // instant checkDi2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (hasTimedOut())Di2015NewLine                    return false; // timed outDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if ((Win32.GetQueueStatus(EVENT_MASK) >> 16) != 0) // high word is non-zero if an input/message is still in the queueDi2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // raise Idle eventDi2015NewLine                System.Windows.Forms.Application.RaiseIdle(EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (hasTimedOut())Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // wait for either a Windows message or the handleDi2015NewLine                // MsgWaitForMultipleObjectsEx with MWMO_INPUTAVAILABLE returns even if there's a message in the message queue already seen but not removedDi2015NewLine                var result = Win32.MsgWaitForMultipleObjectsEx(1, handles, (uint)remainingTimeout, EVENT_MASK, Win32.MWMO_INPUTAVAILABLE);Di2015NewLine                if (result == Win32.WAIT_OBJECT_0 || result == Win32.WAIT_ABANDONED_0)Di2015NewLine                    return true; // handle signalled Di2015NewLine                if (result == Win32.WAIT_TIMEOUT)Di2015NewLine                    return false; // timed outDi2015NewLine                if (result == Win32.WAIT_OBJECT_0 + 1) // an input/message pendingDi2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                // unexpected resultDi2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool WaitWithDoEvents(this WaitHandle handle, int timeout)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return WaitWithDoEvents(handle, CancellationToken.None, timeout);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool WaitWithDoEvents(this WaitHandle handle)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return WaitWithDoEvents(handle, CancellationToken.None, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Win32 interop declarationsDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static class Win32Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_KEY = 0x0001;Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_MOUSEMOVE = 0x0002;Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_MOUSEBUTTON = 0x0004;Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_POSTMESSAGE = 0x0008;Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_TIMER = 0x0010;Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_PAINT = 0x0020;Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_SENDMESSAGE = 0x0040;Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_HOTKEY = 0x0080;Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_ALLPOSTMESSAGE = 0x0100;Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_RAWINPUT = 0x0400;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public const uint QS_MOUSE = (QS_MOUSEMOVE | QS_MOUSEBUTTON);Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_INPUT = (QS_MOUSE | QS_KEY | QS_RAWINPUT);Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_ALLEVENTS = (QS_INPUT | QS_POSTMESSAGE | QS_TIMER | QS_PAINT | QS_HOTKEY);Di2015NewLine            public const uint QS_ALLINPUT = (QS_INPUT | QS_POSTMESSAGE | QS_TIMER | QS_PAINT | QS_HOTKEY | QS_SENDMESSAGE);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public const uint MWMO_INPUTAVAILABLE = 0x0002;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public const uint WAIT_TIMEOUT = 0x00000102;Di2015NewLine            public const uint WAIT_FAILED = 0xFFFFFFFF;Di2015NewLine            public const uint INFINITE = 0xFFFFFFFF;Di2015NewLine            public const uint WAIT_OBJECT_0 = 0;Di2015NewLine            public const uint WAIT_ABANDONED_0 = 0x00000080;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            [DllImport("kernel32.dll")]Di2015NewLine            public static extern uint GetTickCount();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine            public static extern uint GetQueueStatus(uint flags);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            [DllImport("user32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine            public static extern uint MsgWaitForMultipleObjectsEx(Di2015NewLine                uint nCount, IntPtr[] pHandles, uint dwMilliseconds, uint dwWakeMask, uint dwFlags);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

on a collection,   Di2015NewLine//it's member property, operation type and a valaueDi2015NewLinepublic System.Linq.Expressions.Expression<Func<Profile.UserProfile, bool>> GetFilterPredicateFor(FilterOperations operation, string value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var getExpressionBody = CollectionPropertySelector.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine    if (getExpressionBody == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("getExpressionBody is not MemberExpression: " + CollectionPropertySelector.Body);Di2015NewLine CollectionPropertySelector.Body;Di2015NewLine    var right = Expression.Constant(value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this is so far hardcoded, but might be changed later based on operation type  Di2015NewLine    // as well as a "method" belowDi2015NewLine    var innerLambda = Expression.Equal(left, right);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, bool>> innerFunction = var result = Expression.Lambda<Func<UserProfile, bool>>(outerLambda, collectionParameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20465785Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class PredicateBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> True<T> ()  { return f => true;  }Di2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> False<T> () { return f => false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> Or<T> (this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                      Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke (expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression> ());Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine          (Expression.OrElse (expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> And<T> (this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                       Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke (expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression> ());Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine          (Expression.AndAlso (expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20465785Di2015UniqueSeparator  public static Expression<Func<Product, bool>> ContainsInDescription (Di2015NewLine                                                params string[] keywords)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var predicate = PredicateBuilder.False<Product>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (string keyword in keywords)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      string temp = keyword;Di2015NewLine      predicate = predicate.Or (p => p.Description.Contains (temp));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return predicate;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

20474349Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomCollection<TModel, TSortKey> : ObservableCollection<TModel>Di2015NewLine    where TModel : EntityBaseClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<TModel, bool> _condition;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<TModel, TSortKey> sortSelector;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CustomCollection(ObservableCollection<TModel> source,Di2015NewLine        Func<TModel, bool> condition,Di2015NewLine        Func<TModel, TSortKey> sortSelector)Di2015NewLine        : base(source.Where(condition).OrderBy(sortSelector))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _condition = condition;Di2015NewLine        this.sortSelector = sortSelector;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20474378Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate unsafe static void combine_img(Bitmap img1, Bitmap img2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BitmapData image1 = img1.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, img1.Width, img1.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLine        BitmapData image2 = img2.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, img2.Width, img2.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int bytesPerPixel = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte* scan1 = (byte*)image1.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLine        int stride1 = image1.Stride;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte* scan2 = (byte*)image2.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLine        int stride2 = image2.Stride;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < img1.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte* row1 = scan1 + (y * stride1);Di2015NewLine            byte* row2 = scan2 + (y * stride2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < img1.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (row2[x * bytesPerPixel] == 255)Di2015NewLine                    row1[x * bytesPerPixel] = row1[x * bytesPerPixel - 1] = row1[x * bytesPerPixel-2] = 255;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        img1.UnlockBits(image1);Di2015NewLine        img2.UnlockBits(image2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20479743Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ListItemValueComparer : IEqualityComparer<ListItem>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(ListItem x, ListItem y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x.Value.Equals(y.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(ListItem obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return obj.Value.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20479962Di2015UniqueSeparator// My previous method:Di2015NewLinestring file = File.ReadAllText("koi8-r.eml");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Correct method:    Di2015NewLineEncoding efile = detectTextEncoding("koi8-r.eml", out file);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetxtRaw.Text = output;Di2015NewLine
20479962Di2015UniqueSeparator// Function to detect the encoding for UTF-7, UTF-8/16/32 (bom, no bom, littleDi2015NewLine// & big endian), and local default codepage, and potentially other codepages.Di2015NewLine// 'taster' = number of bytes to check of the file (to save processing). HigherDi2015NewLine// value is slower, but more reliable (especially UTF-8 with special charactersDi2015NewLine// later on may appear to be ASCII initially). If taster = 0, then tasterDi2015NewLine// becomes the length of the file (for maximum reliability). 'text' is simplyDi2015NewLine// the string with the discovered encoding applied to the file.Di2015NewLinepublic Encoding detectTextEncoding(string filename, out String text, int taster = 1000)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinebyte[] b = File.ReadAllBytes(filename);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//////////////// First check the low hanging fruit by checking if aDi2015NewLine//////////////// BOM/signature exists (sourced from http://www.unicode.org/faq/utf_bom.html#bom4)Di2015NewLineif (b.Length >= 4 && b[0] == 0x00 && b[1] == 0x00 && b[2] == 0xFE && b[3] == 0xFF) { text = Encoding.GetEncoding("utf-32BE").GetString(b, 4, b.Length - 4); return Encoding.GetEncoding("utf-32BE"); }  // UTF-32, big-endian Di2015NewLineelse if (b.Length >= 4 && b[0] == 0xFF && b[1] == 0xFE && b[2] == 0x00 && b[3] == 0x00) { text = Encoding.UTF32.GetString(b, 4, b.Length - 4); return Encoding.UTF32; }    // UTF-32, little-endianDi2015NewLineelse if (b.Length >= 2 && b[0] == 0xFE && b[1] == 0xFF) { text = Encoding.BigEndianUnicode.GetString(b, 2, b.Length - 2); return Encoding.BigEndianUnicode; }     // UTF-16, big-endianDi2015NewLineelse if (b.Length >= 2 && b[0] == 0xFF && b[1] == 0xFE) { text = Encoding.Unicode.GetString(b, 2, b.Length - 2); return Encoding.Unicode; }              // UTF-16, little-endianDi2015NewLineelse if (b.Length >= 3 && b[0] == 0xEF && b[1] == 0xBB && b[2] == 0xBF) { text = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(b, 3, b.Length - 3); return Encoding.UTF8; } // UTF-8Di2015NewLineelse if (b.Length >= 3 && b[0] == 0x2b && b[1] == 0x2f && b[2] == 0x76) { text = Encoding.UTF7.GetString(b,3,b.Length-3); return Encoding.UTF7; } // UTF-7Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//////////// If the code reaches here, no BOM/signature was found, so nowDi2015NewLine//////////// we need to 'taste' the file to see if can manually discoverDi2015NewLine//////////// the encoding. A high taster value is desired for UTF-8Di2015NewLineif (taster == 0 || taster > b.Length) taster = b.Length;    // Taster size can't be bigger than the filesize obviously.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Some text files are encoded in UTF8, but have no BOM/signature. HenceDi2015NewLine// the below manually checks for a UTF8 pattern. This code is based offDi2015NewLine// the top answer at: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6555015/check-for-invalid-utf8Di2015NewLine// For our purposes, an unnecessarily strict (and terser/slower)Di2015NewLine// implementation is shown at: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1031645/how-to-detect-utf-8-in-plain-cDi2015NewLine// For the below, false positives should be exceedingly rare (and wouldDi2015NewLine// be either slightly malformed UTF-8 (which would suit our purposesDi2015NewLine// anyway) or 8-bit extended ASCII/UTF-16/32 at a vanishingly long shot).Di2015NewLineint i = 0;Di2015NewLinebool utf8 = false;Di2015NewLinewhile (i < taster - 4)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (b[i] <= 0x7F) { i += 1; continue; }     // If all characters are below 0x80, then it is valid UTF8, but UTF8 is not 'required' (and therefore the text is more desirable to be treated as the default codepage of the computer). Hence, there's no "utf8 = true;" code unlike the next three checks.Di2015NewLine    if (b[i] >= 0xC2 && b[i] <= 0xDF && b[i + 1] >= 0x80 && b[i + 1] < 0xC0) { i += 2; utf8 = true; continue; }Di2015NewLine    if (b[i] >= 0xE0 && b[i] <= 0xF0 && b[i + 1] >= 0x80 && b[i + 1] < 0xC0 && b[i + 2] >= 0x80 && b[i + 2] < 0xC0) { i += 3; utf8 = true; continue; }Di2015NewLine    if (b[i] >= 0xF0 && b[i] <= 0xF4 && b[i + 1] >= 0x80 && b[i + 1] < 0xC0 && b[i + 2] >= 0x80 && b[i + 2] < 0xC0 && b[i + 3] >= 0x80 && b[i + 3] < 0xC0) { i += 4; utf8 = true; continue; }Di2015NewLine    utf8 = false; break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (utf8 == true) {Di2015NewLine    text = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(b);Di2015NewLine    return Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The next check is a heuristic attempt to detect UTF-16 without a BOM.Di2015NewLine// We simply look for zeroes in odd or even byte places, and if a certainDi2015NewLine// threshold is reached, the code is 'probably' UF-16.          Di2015NewLinedouble threshold = 0.1; // proportion of chars step 2 which must be zeroed to be diagnosed as utf-16. 0.1 = 10%Di2015NewLineint count = 0;Di2015NewLinefor (int n = 0; n < taster; n += 2) if (b[n] == 0) count++;Di2015NewLineif (((double)count) / taster > threshold) { text = Encoding.BigEndianUnicode.GetString(b); return Encoding.BigEndianUnicode; }Di2015NewLinecount = 0;Di2015NewLinefor (int n = 1; n < taster; n += 2) if (b[n] == 0) count++;Di2015NewLineif (((double)count) / taster > threshold) { text = Encoding.Unicode.GetString(b); return Encoding.Unicode; } // (little-endian)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Finally, a long shot - let's see if we can find "charset=xyz" orDi2015NewLine// "encoding=xyz" to identify the encoding:Di2015NewLinefor (int n = 0; n < taster-9; n++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Di2015NewLine        ((b[n + 0] == 'c' || b[n + 0] == 'C') && (b[n + 1] == 'h' || b[n + 1] == 'H') && (b[n + 2] == 'a' || b[n + 2] == 'A') && (b[n + 3] == 'r' || b[n + 3] == 'R') && (b[n + 4] == 's' || b[n + 4] == 'S') && (b[n + 5] == 'e' || b[n + 5] == 'E') && (b[n + 6] == 't' || b[n + 6] == 'T') && (b[n + 7] == '=')) ||Di2015NewLine        ((b[n + 0] == 'e' || b[n + 0] == 'E') && (b[n + 1] == 'n' || b[n + 1] == 'N') && (b[n + 2] == 'c' || b[n + 2] == 'C') && (b[n + 3] == 'o' || b[n + 3] == 'O') && (b[n + 4] == 'd' || b[n + 4] == 'D') && (b[n + 5] == 'i' || b[n + 5] == 'I') && (b[n + 6] == 'n' || b[n + 6] == 'N') && (b[n + 7] == 'g' || b[n + 7] == 'G') && (b[n + 8] == '='))Di2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (b[n + 0] == 'c' || b[n + 0] == 'C') n += 8; else n += 9;Di2015NewLine        if (b[n] == '"' || b[n] == '\\'') n++;Di2015NewLine        int oldn = n;Di2015NewLine        while (n < taster && (b[n] == '_' || b[n] == '-' || (b[n] >= '0' && b[n] <= '9') || (b[n] >= 'a' && b[n] <= 'z') || (b[n] >= 'A' && b[n] <= 'Z')))Di2015NewLine        { n++; }Di2015NewLine        byte[] nb = new byte[n-oldn];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(b, oldn, nb, 0, n-oldn);Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            string internalEnc = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(nb);Di2015NewLine            text = Encoding.GetEncoding(internalEnc).GetString(b);Di2015NewLine            return Encoding.GetEncoding(internalEnc);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch { break; }    // If C# doesn't recognize the name of the encoding, break.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// If all else fails, the encoding is probably (though certainly notDi2015NewLine// definitely) the user's local codepage! One might present to the user aDi2015NewLine// list of alternative encodings as shown here: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8509339/what-is-the-most-common-encoding-of-each-languageDi2015NewLine// A full list can be found using Encoding.GetEncodings();Di2015NewLinetext = Encoding.Default.GetString(b);Di2015NewLinereturn Encoding.Default;Di2015NewLine

20479972Di2015UniqueSeparatorwhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    redemptionsList.redemptions.Clear();Di2015NewLine    string uri = String.Format("http://platypus:28642/api/Redemptions/{0}/{1}", lastIdFetched, RECORDS_TO_FETCH);Di2015NewLine    var webRequest = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(uri);Di2015NewLine    webRequest.Method = "GET";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var webResponse = (HttpWebResponse)webRequest.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (webResponse.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var reader = new StreamReader(webResponse.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine            string s = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            var arr = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<JArray>(s);Di2015NewLine            if (arr == null) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (JObject obj in arr)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                id = obj.Value<int?>("Id") ?? 0;Di2015NewLine                var _redemptionId = obj.Value<string>("RedemptionId") ?? 20483270Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static unsafe void CombineImage(Bitmap image1, Bitmap image2, int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<long, int> testDict = new Dictionary<long, int>(); //the magic is wit this dictionaryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var combinedBitmap = new Bitmap(image1.Width, image1.Height, image1.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BitmapData bData1 = image1.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, image1.Width, image1.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, image1.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine        BitmapData bData2 = image2.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, image2.Width, image2.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, image2.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine        BitmapData bDataCombined = combinedBitmap.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, combinedBitmap.Width, combinedBitmap.Height), ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, combinedBitmap.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte* dataBase = (byte*)bData1.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLine        byte* dataDetail = (byte*)bData2.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLine        byte* dataCombined = (byte*)bDataCombined.Scan0.ToPointer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const int bitsPerPixel = 24;Di2015NewLine        const int xIncr = bitsPerPixel / 8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var t = new Vec3f(0);Di2015NewLine        var u = new Vec3f(0);Di2015NewLine        var r = new Vec3f(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int h = bData1.Height, w = bData1.Width;Di2015NewLine        long key;Di2015NewLine        int value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stopwatch combineStopwatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < h; ++y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < w; ++x)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //real magic!Di2015NewLine                key = dataBase[0] | (dataBase[1] << 8) | (dataBase[2] << 16) | (dataDetail[0] << 24) | (dataDetail[1] << 32) | (dataDetail[2] << 40);Di2015NewLine                if (testDict.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    value = testDict[key];Di2015NewLine                    dataCombined[0] = (byte)(value & 255);Di2015NewLine                    dataCombined[1] = (byte)((value >> 8) & 255);Di2015NewLine                    dataCombined[2] = (byte)((value >> 16) & 255);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    t.z = (dataBase[0] / 255.0f) * 2.0f;Di2015NewLine                    t.y = (dataBase[1] / 255.0f) * 2.0f - 1.0f;Di2015NewLine                    t.x = (dataBase[2] / 255.0f) * 2.0f - 1.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    u.z = (dataDetail[0] / 255.0f) * 2.0f - 1.0f;Di2015NewLine                    u.y = (dataDetail[1] / 255.0f) * -2.0f + 1.0f;Di2015NewLine                    u.x = (dataDetail[2] / 255.0f) * -2.0f + 1.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    r = t * t.Dot(u) - u * t.z;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    r.Normalize();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Write data to our new bitmapDi2015NewLine                    dataCombined[0] = (byte)Math.Round((r.z * 0.5f + 0.5f) * 255.0f);Di2015NewLine                    dataCombined[1] = (byte)Math.Round((r.y * 0.5f + 0.5f) * 255.0f);Di2015NewLine                    dataCombined[2] = (byte)Math.Round((r.x * 0.5f + 0.5f) * 255.0f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    value = dataCombined[0] | (dataCombined[1] << 8) | (dataCombined[2] << 16);Di2015NewLine                    testDict.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                dataBase += xIncr;Di2015NewLine                dataDetail += xIncr;Di2015NewLine                dataCombined += xIncr;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        combineStopwatch.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        combinedBitmap.UnlockBits(bDataCombined);Di2015NewLine        image2.UnlockBits(bData1);Di2015NewLine        image1.UnlockBits(bData1);Di2015NewLine        //combinedBitmap.Save("helloyou.png", ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine        testDict.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Write(combineStopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds + "\\n");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

20491438Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void SomeMethod()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var container = new Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        user = userWS.GetUsers(),Di2015NewLine        documents = documentWS.GetDocuments()Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // returns: "user.username.value"Di2015NewLine    string usernameProperty = GetMapperValueById ( "username" );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var value = GetPropertyValue(container, usernameProperty);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic object GetPropertyValue(object obj, string propertyPath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    System.Reflection.PropertyInfo result = null;Di2015NewLine    string[] pathSteps = propertyPath.Split('.');Di2015NewLine    object currentObj = obj;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < pathSteps.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type currentType = currentObj.GetType();Di2015NewLine        string currentPathStep = pathSteps[i];Di2015NewLine        var currentPathStepMatches = Regex.Match(currentPathStep, @"(\\w+)(?:\\[(\\d+)\\])?");Di2015NewLine        result = currentType.GetProperty(currentPathStepMatches.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine        if (result.PropertyType.IsArray)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = int.Parse(currentPathStepMatches.Groups[2].Value);Di2015NewLine            currentObj = (result.GetValue(currentObj) as Array).GetValue(index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            currentObj = result.GetValue(currentObj);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return currentObj;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

20493025Di2015UniqueSeparatorSendInput
20493025Di2015UniqueSeparatorkeybd_event?</p>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<p>To call SendInput from C#, you're going to need to create a whole bunch of structs. Fortunately, most of this information can be gleaned from <a href="http://pinvoke.net" rel="nofollow">pinvoke.net</a>. </p>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<p>Looking at the pinvoke documentation for <a href="http://www.pinvoke.net/default.aspx/Structures/INPUT.html" rel="nofollow">SendInput</a> and the <a href="http://www.pinvoke.net/default.aspx/user32.SendInput" rel="nofollow">INPUT</a> struct, I came up with the following. The method I've written at the top called <em>SendInputWithAPI</em> is calling SendInput to simulate the sending of "wsad". The rest of the code is just the structure declarations you need to make it work.</p>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<pre>    void SendInputWithAPI()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        INPUT[] Inputs = new INPUT[4];Di2015NewLine        INPUT Input = new INPUT();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Input.type = 1; // 1 = Keyboard InputDi2015NewLine        Input.U.ki.wScan = ScanCodeShort.KEY_W;Di2015NewLine        Input.U.ki.dwFlags = KEYEVENTF.SCANCODE;   Di2015NewLine        Inputs[0] = Input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Input.type = 1; // 1 = Keyboard InputDi2015NewLine        Input.U.ki.wScan = ScanCodeShort.KEY_S;Di2015NewLine        Input.U.ki.dwFlags = KEYEVENTF.SCANCODE;Di2015NewLine        Inputs[1] = Input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Input.type = 1; // 1 = Keyboard InputDi2015NewLine        Input.U.ki.wScan = ScanCodeShort.KEY_A;Di2015NewLine        Input.U.ki.dwFlags = KEYEVENTF.SCANCODE;Di2015NewLine        Inputs[2] = Input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Input.type = 1; // 1 = Keyboard InputDi2015NewLine        Input.U.ki.wScan = ScanCodeShort.KEY_D;Di2015NewLine        Input.U.ki.dwFlags = KEYEVENTF.SCANCODE;Di2015NewLine        Inputs[3] = Input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SendInput(4, Inputs, INPUT.Size);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Declaration of external SendInput methodDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    internal static extern uint SendInput(Di2015NewLine        uint nInputs,Di2015NewLine        [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPArray), In] INPUT[] pInputs,Di2015NewLine        int cbSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Declare the INPUT structDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    public struct INPUTDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        internal uint type;Di2015NewLine        internal InputUnion U;Di2015NewLine        internal static int SizeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(INPUT)); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Declare the InputUnion structDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Explicit)]Di2015NewLine    internal struct InputUnionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine        internal MOUSEINPUT mi;Di2015NewLine        [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine        internal KEYBDINPUT ki;Di2015NewLine        [FieldOffset(0)]Di2015NewLine time;Di2015NewLine        internal UIntPtr dwExtraInfo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [Flags]Di2015NewLine    internal enum MouseEventDataXButtons : uintDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Nothing = 0x00000000,Di2015NewLine        XBUTTON1 = 0x00000001,Di2015NewLine        XBUTTON2 = 0x00000002Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [Flags]Di2015NewLine 0x2000,Di2015NewLine        LEFTDOWN = 0x0002,Di2015NewLine        LEFTUP = 0x0004,Di2015NewLine        RIGHTDOWN = 0x0008,Di2015NewLine        RIGHTUP = 0x0010,Di2015NewLine        MIDDLEDOWN = 0x0100Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    internal struct KEYBDINPUTDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        internal VirtualKeyShort wVk;Di2015NewLine        internal ScanCodeShort wScan;Di2015NewLine        internal KEYEVENTF dwFlags;Di2015NewLine        internal int time;Di2015NewLine        internal UIntPtr = 0x0002,Di2015NewLine        SCANCODE = 0x0008,Di2015NewLine        UNICODE = 0x0004Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal enum VirtualKeyShort : shortDi2015NewLine 20500487Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static void Add<TKey, TValue>(Di2015NewLine    this Dictionary<TKey, HashSet<TValue>> data, TKey key, TValue value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    HashSet<TValue> values = null;Di2015NewLine    if (!data.TryGetValue(key, out values)) {Di2015NewLine      // first time using this key? create a new HashSet Di2015NewLine      values = new HashSet<TValue>();Di2015NewLine      data.Add(key, values);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    values.Add(value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  public static IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>> KeyValuePairs<TKey, TValue>(Di2015NewLine    this Dictionary<TKey, HashSet<TValue>> data)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return data.SelectMany(k => k.Value,Di2015NewLine                           (k, v) => new KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>(k.Key, v));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
20500487Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Dictionary<string, HashSet<string>> data = new Dictionary<string, HashSet<string>>();Di2015NewLine  data.Add("k1", "v1.1");Di2015NewLine  data.Add("k1", "v1.2");Di2015NewLine  data.Add("k1", "v1.1"); // already in, so nothing happens hereDi2015NewLine  data.Add("k2", "v2.1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (var kv in data.KeyValuePairs())Di2015NewLine     Console.WriteLine(kv.Key + " : " + kv.Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
